Gartner's Critical Capabilities for Data Management Solutions for Analytics
View Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gartner-data-report]]>
Data management solutions for analytics (DMSA) are evolving rapidly, with new deployment scenarios, data sources and analytics requirements driving the market. Organizations now require DMSA’s with cloud-centric features that can manage and process internal and external data of diverse types in diverse formats.
We invite you to view Gartner’s Critical Capabilities for Data Management Solutions for Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gartner-data-report]]> as a guide to modern DMSA offerings. By using a combination of product capabilities and customer experiences to evaluate 20 vendors across 10 functional capabilities, this report is aimed to help data and analytics professionals make the right choice for their DMSA needs.
